title: Supp von Competitive Team LF ADC [ESL/EBL]

embed.title: Kels Esports (@Kels_Esports) | Twitter
embed.description: The latest Tweets from Kels Esports (@Kels_Esports). Official Twitter account of Kels Esports. #WeWillRise | Discord: https://t.co/0HRmyeebVQ | Business inquiries: christianbartha.business@gmail.com

body:
Hallo,

ich bin auf der Suche nach einem ADC für unser Competitive Team namens Kels Esports.

Das Ziel ist sich für die zweite Liga der ESL oder für die EBL zu qualifizieren.

Da ich die Freiheit habe mich für einen selbst zu entscheiden werde ich Tryouts mit euch machen.

Die Anforderungen sind auf Englisch, bitte nur bewerben wenn ihr diese auch erfüllt.

Falls Ihr Fragen habt oder auch bewerben möchtet addet mich einfach IG: **Maltus104**

Viele Grüße



Our Views:

Player growth (we will help you achieve your goals as a player)

Player happiness (we want all of our players to enjoy their time with us)

Long-term focus (we want to work with our players for a long time and be successful together)

What can we offer you?

Professional and friendly environment (you work with us, not for us)

Professional management (every person on the management team has been carefully picked to perfectly fit our views) - Coaching (an experienced coach that will help you improve)

Pay (more details will be given in a later stage)

What we expect from you:

Minimum rank (in season 8): Diamond 3+

Time for training

Reliability

Trust

Active playing and training

Teamwork

Accept creative criticism

Requirements you are obliged to meet:

You must be at least 16 years old

Be able to speak English at a good level

Willingness to commit both socially and gameplay wise
